Collection.name: Records
Collection.type: Eamon.ThirdParty.BTree`1[[Eamon.Framework.IArtifact, Eamon, Version=1.7.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null]], Eamon, Version=1.7.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Behind a sliding metal flap on the west wall is a card slot.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see an engraving on the fake-looking back wall of the chamber.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: On the wall of the elevator chamber is a button marked "UP."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: On the wall is a button marked "DOWN."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: To the left of the opening is a large wooden desk.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: On the desk sits a name plate.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: On the desk sits a telephone-like device.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: On the desk sits a microphone.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: To the right of the opening, attached to the wall, is a thick bronze plaque.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A small spigot attached to a one meter length of retractable plastic tubing is inset in the table next to a large depression.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A large cabinet is set up against the eastern wall.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see several spice containers (color coded).

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a set of fine metallic utensils suitable for serving people.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Set up against the southern wall is a huge vat, nearly one meter across.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A large oval door blocks the way to the west.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A pipe protrudes from the wall, about 1.3 meters over the vat.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: In the southwest corner is a massive, spherical apparatus roughly the size of a dishwasher. On the top are openings of various sizes, one notably larger than the others. Around the bottom of the device are many tubes and deposit areas.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A small black button is set into the top of the machine.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Below the black button is a small yellow button.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You also see a small red button next to the first two.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see some food in one of the deposit areas, the product of your experimentation.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: In the center of the room is a thick pillar studded with lights and dials. Around the base of the pillar, at a one meter distance, a red circle has been painted on the floor.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Ten glass tanks are evenly spaced around the edge of the dome at balcony level. Within these tanks are all manner of sea life, specially mutated for adaptation to freshwater environments.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A dark pool of unknown depth fills almost half the floor space in this room. Dim images are reflected off its still surface.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: An unmarked card slot is located next to the door at the southwestern end of the passage.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: On one wall is a small green button.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A rusty Bunsen burner lies on the floor here.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Dozens of Petri dishes sit in various places: on shelves, in cabinets, and on tables.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A sturdy pedestal sits in the far corner of the lab.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Sitting on the pedestal is a typewriter-sized analytical balance.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Included among the glass pipes and tubing is a hand-sized voltmeter.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a pH meter next to the voltmeter.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A combination mass spectrograph/high pressure gas chromatograph lies nearby.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: In the tank on the far left is the metallic framework of a man interlaced with a mesh of electronic wiring. It is floating in a clear, amber fluid.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: In the tank to its immediate right is a similar framework. However, partially covering the metal skeleton is a layer of muscle and sinew.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: In the next container is a very man-like figure complete with skin, but lacking distinct toes, fingers, and eyes.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: In the final tank is a creature indistinguishable from a pure strain human, complete with hair, nails, and facial features.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: In the center of the room is a large round table, apparently used for operating.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a box-sized device, encrusted with antennae, knobs, and dials.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Also visible on the table are syringes, clamps, and other standard operating tools.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Above the table hangs a complex machine with many bladed appendages.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: On the right wall is a control console equipped with a normal keyboard.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: On the console are several dozen buttons of unknown purpose.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Lining the walls are several rows of slowly rotating recording drums.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: On the back wall is a display screen about one meter square.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Ten humming, refrigerator-sized cabinets are located throughout the room, all connected by thick, black cables.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Against the back wall are three computer terminals.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A large locker sits in the corner of the excursion prep. The lock is very old, and has nearly rusted through.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You find a set of advanced SCUBA gear. The set includes a wetsuit, energized fins, and a headpiece containing the mask and air supply.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a wall rack here.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A spear gun, equipped with wicked looking spears, was set into the wall rack.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: On the right hand wall is a button marked "FLOOD."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: In the center of the room is a massive underwater vehicle covered with clear plastic bubbles and strange mechanical devices. The ship sports two five-meter long pincer-like appendages. Written on the side is the name "AQUATRON SEVEN."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A control panel sits on the wall between the internal and external locks.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A button marked "BAY DOORS OPEN" sits on the control panel.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A button marked "BAY DOORS CLOSE" sits on the control panel.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A long, crystalline column extends from the floor through the ceiling. On the end of this column is a two-meter parabolic reflector.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a large hemispherical control console.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: On the control console is a covered panel labeled "SHIELD CONTROL."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You also see a panel labeled "INSTALLATION DEFENSE."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: On the SHIELD CONTROL panel you find a dial marked along its perimeter with the letters of the Greek alphabet from alpha to omega. The setting is presently on mu, about halfway through the alphabet.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a button marked "ELEVATION INCREASE."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a button marked "ELEVATION DECREASE."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a button marked "ROTATE TURRET."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see Bill and Ted's Bogus Entry.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a pistol of some type here.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see another pistol, of the long-barreled type.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see the android's weapon, a gun of some sort.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The salt-shaker sized object is here.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see the warrior android's weapon - a very deadly device.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see Jules' axe - a long wooden shaft with a large duralloy head.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see the Baron's weapon - basically an energized mace with a rubber handle.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see Red-Eye's weapon - a small and easily concealed crossbow.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Searching the remains of the android reveals a small featureless card made out of a durable plastic.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The back wall of this cave - the one with the inscription carved into it - is rather fake-looking. I'd bet that it isn't really stone.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This chamber's walls are made entirely out of glass, and thus appear to be somewhat fragile.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The tiles beneath your feet have turned out to be a trap; they are electrified!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The horl choo lies here, hacked and mangled by your efforts.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The first android falls and lies on the floor, dead as a doornail.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The second android lies in a puddle of its own (synthetic) blood.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The android falls over, and lies still.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The thinker android finally falls to your persistent attacks.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The thinker android, being virtually defenseless, is easily "killed."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see the largest of the two hammerheads, lying belly up on the floor.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The smaller of the two hammerheads gets hacked to pieces.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The first silver android falls over "dead."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The second silver android "dies," and slumps to the ground.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The thinker android falls over and "dies" on the floor.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The worker android's body lies here.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The fen has been slain and will trouble you no more.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see the still form of the lab technician android.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The warrior android is finally defeated.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see Cool Jules, and he's gonna get a lot cooler before the day is through.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Ol' Red-Eye lies in a heap on the floor. Sad.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Archibald is killed by the repeated attacks of the enemy.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The glass walls are smashed into a million crystal splinters.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The back wall of the cave is reduced to a pile of rubble.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see the formerly electrified floor. It is still smoking and sparks occasionally where you destroyed it.

Collection.name: FreeUids
Collection.type: System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[System.Int64, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]], mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089
